Comment: This isn‚Äôt taking into account that many users don‚Äôt have self-custody wallets. Those that buy straight off the exchange via the regular Robinhood or Coinbase app aren‚Äôt registered as individual buys from an individual wallet, those are registered from robinhood or coinbase custodial wallets.  If you have the Robinhood Wallet or Coinbase Wallet app, though, then an individual is being tracked 1:1 with a wallet.   TLDR; these data figures are excluding many many individuals that aren‚Äôt trading from their personal wallet
